space of next scale ​complete 8 v­stitches​ chain 1 and double_crochet in the chain space of the marked scale row 9 ​chain 3 and 4 double_crochet in the first double_crochet of the v­stitch chain 3 slip_stitch in first chain and 5 double_crochet in the second double_crochet of the v­stitch continue across completing 4 scales row 10­15 ​ continue to decrease your v­stitches and scales row 10­11 6 fasten_off bodice this next section will be worked directly on the original chain we began with and will work downwards instead of upwards this means our next crocodile stitches will be worked upside down ; each row of scales will be below the previous row instead of on top row 1 ​flip to the wrong side of the piece attach at the stitch at the point of the first v­stitch from the previous row
